text: Jhon Steven Mondragón Dosman (born 15 October 1994) is a Colombian footballer. Mainly a right back, he can also play as a central defender or a central midfielder. He is currently under contract with Petrolul Ploiești.MonDRAGON printre ”lupi”! Petrolul a oficializat a 17-a achiziție pentru acest sezon. Ultima noutate este un fundaș care a jucat în La Liga pentru Osasuna. liga2.prosport.ro ==Club career== ===Osasuna=== Born in Cali, Steven moved from Tuluá to Navarre, Spain aged six years and finished his formation with CA Osasuna's youth setup. On 19 October 2013 he made his debut with the reserves, coming on as a substitute for Marc Nierga in a 3–0 Tercera División home win against CD Pamplona. On 6 January 2016 Steven scored his first senior goal, netting the first in a 4–0 away routing of CD Mendi. He was an undisputed starter for the B-side during the campaign which ended in promotion, contributing 34 appearances. In the following season in the third tier, he was almost ever-present again (29 starts) before being promoted to the first team squad. On 22 April 2017 Steven made his first team – and La Liga – debut, replacing injured Nikola Vujadinović in a 2–2 home draw against Sporting de Gijón. Eight days later he scored his first goal in the category, netting the first in a 2–2 home draw against Deportivo de La Coruña, and found the net again in his next appearance against Granada C.F., opening the scoring in a 2–1 victory. Nevertheless, at the season's end, Osasuna were relegated from the top division and Steven's contract was not renewed. ===Puebla=== After some weeks without a club, in September 2017 Steven signed for Liga MX team Club Puebla. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Cali Category:Colombian footballers Category:Navarrese footballers Category:People from Estella Oriental Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football utility players Category:La Liga players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:CD Izarra footballers Category:CA Osasuna B players Category:CA Osasuna players Category:Club Puebla players Category:Leones F.C. footballers Category:Sport Boys footballers Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:Liga MX players Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Peruvian Primera División players Category:Liga II players Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Peru Category:Expatriate footballers in Peru Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania
